-- Delete the record with ID 16

-- Insert with specific ID 15

  id,
  name, 
  code,

  api_endpoint,

  api_secret,
  webhook_secret,
  is_active,
  config,

  supported_countries,
  min_amount,
  max_amount,
  auto_approval,
  requires_kyc
) VALUES (
  15,
  ''IGPX Sportsbook'',
  ''igpx'',
  ''both'',
  ''IGPX Sportsbook integration for sports betting'',
  ''https://sp-int-9cr.6579883.com'',
  ''jackpotx'',
  ''NwFhr_KsyqpJwi62_Bc'',
  ''737e36e0-6d0b-4a67-aa50-2c448fe319f3'',
  true,
  ''{""api_version"": ""1.0.0"", ""client_username"": ""jackpotx""}'',
  ''{""USD""}'',
  ''{""ALL""}'',
  1.00,
  100000.00,
  true,
  false
);

-- Update the sequence to prevent conflicts
SELECT setval(''payment_gateways_id_seq'', (SELECT MAX(id) FROM payment_gateways));

-- Verify the insert
SELECT id, name, code, is_active FROM payment_gateways WHERE code = ''igpx'';
")
